In the beginning: Honor your father
In the beginning, God created the heaven: Honor your father and your mother, that your days may be long in the land that the LORD your God is giving you.

In the beginning: This is the day that the LORD has made;
In the beginning, God created the heaven: This is the day that the LORD has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.

In the beginning: Your word is a lamp to my feet
In the beginning, God created the heaven: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

In the beginning: Trust in the L ORD with all your heart
In the beginning, God created the heaven: Trust in the LORD with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.

In the beginning: A soft answer turns away wrath
In the beginning, God created the heaven: A soft answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.

In the beginning: For to us a child is born, to us a son is given
In the beginning, God created the heaven: For to us a child is born, to us a son is given; and the government shall be upon his shoulder, and his name shall be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.

In the beginning: The grass withers
In the beginning, God created the heaven: The grass withers, the flower fades, but the word of our God will stand forever.

In the beginning: The LORD is Good
In the beginning, God created the heaven: The LORD is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble; he knows those who take refuge in him.

In the beginning: Then Jesus said to him, "Be gone, Satan! For it is written,
In the beginning, God created the heaven: Then Jesus said to him, "Be gone, Satan! For it is written,  'You shall worship the Lord your God and him only shall you serve.'"

In the beginning: In the same way, let your light shine
In the beginning, God created the heaven: In the same way, let your light shine before others, so that they may see your good works and give glory to your Father who is in heaven.

In the beginning: Judge not, and you will not be judged
In the beginning, God created the heaven: Judge not, and you will not be judged; condemn not, and you will not be condemned; forgive, and you will be forgiven;

In the beginning: And I tell you, ask, and it will be given to you
In the beginning, God created the heaven: And I tell you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

In the beginning: For God so loved the world
In the beginning, God created the heaven: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.

In the beginning: This is my commandment
In the beginning, God created the heaven: This is my commandment, that you love one another as I have loved you.

In the beginning: And they said, Believe in the Lord Jesus
In the beginning, God created the heaven: And they said, "Believe in the Lord Jesus, and you will be saved, you and your household."

In the beginning: And we know that for those who love God
In the beginning, God created the heaven: And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.

In the beginning: I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God
In the beginning, God created the heaven: I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship.

In the beginning: Moreover, it is required
In the beginning, God created the heaven: Moreover, it is required of stewards that they be found trustworthy.

In the beginning: Be kind to one another
In the beginning, God created the heaven: Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.

In the beginning: Whatever you do
In the beginning, God created the heaven: Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men,

In the beginning: for God gave us a spirit not of fear
In the beginning, God created the heaven: for God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.

In the beginning: All Scripture is breathed out by God
In the beginning, God created the heaven: All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness,

In the beginning: If we confess our sins
In the beginning, God created the heaven: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

In the beginning: Worthy are you, our Lord and God
In the beginning, God created the heaven: "Worthy are you, our Lord and God, to receive glory and honor and power, for you created all things, and by your will they existed and were created."
